title: Trust Your Instruments, with Andy Frisella - Thursday Thunder
itunes:title: Trust Your Instruments, with Andy Frisella - MFCEO183
description: When people experience hard times or something they didn't plan on, the tendency is to freak out, start second-guessing themselves, and back track on their plans.  In this episode, I tell a story about flying home from Vegas when something we heard scared the sh*t out of us. The lesson for us then, and the lesson for all of life, is this: Relax. And trust your instruments.
